Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search

Class CorpusQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.Query
      • com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search.CorpusQuery
  • public class CorpusQuery
extends org.apache.lucene.search.Query
    Query with a document iterator backed on a BitSet (the corpus). Used as a filter in a boolean Query.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CorpusQuery.DummyScorer  
      class  CorpusQuery.LeafBitsIterator
      An iterator on a global index reader bitSet returning doc ids local to a leaf context.

      Build the search with a BitSet of docids, and a name, used as a key for caching.
